478¶

Introduction¶

Successor of the 423 socket, uses the SDR, DDR and DDR2 memory standards. Predecessor of the LGA775 socket.

Key Facts & Figures¶

Microarchitecture:

?

Process nodes:

?

Core counts:

Singlecores only

Native FSB:

100 MHz

Release Year:

2001

Benching it¶

TBA

Overclocking-Wiki
